summary.para: Gets the length, in tracks, of the timed-text-track list.

returns.para: Returns the length, in tracks, of the timed-text-track list.

summary.para: Gets a text track in the list from the index of the track.

param.name: index
param.para: The index of the track in the list to retrieve.

param.name: track
param.para: A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to the interface for the timed-text track.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets a text track in the list from the identifier of the track.

param.name: trackId
param.para: The identifier of the track in the list to retrieve.

param.name: track
param.para: A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to the interface for the timed-text track.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Represents a list of timed-text tracks.
